title: Windows 10 Creator Update alt tab crash
body: Since Windows forced me to make the update, every time I alt tab back into the game, it crashes. I tried looking online for a solution online, but I couldn't find anything. Can you guys help me?

replies.body: Ooooo let's check to make sure that the XBox Game DVR is still turned off. It can cause quite a few problems with League so it's always good to have that disabled when playing. Let me know if that fixes this al+tab thing or not!
So far, so good! It seems to have fixed the issue. Thanks! :D {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
